thread.section_title: Frontierinternet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frontierinternet | frontierinternet.com
thread.title: alex hamzeh

author: alex hamzeh
title: alex hamzeh
text: After I paid $360 last weekend for my bill after two days they disconnect my service again and they say I owe 1 $187 they have no explanation why so I have to disconnect my service and in my area this is the only company and I have no Internet or TV at the house right now I don't think that's fair at all for them to charge us whatever they want because they are the only ones in our area so sad
